casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Paul DAVIS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 18, 2018 Mary A. Beallie, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 324 , 175 A.3d 71 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
